title: Jana Kramer shows off toned arms in a sleeveless top as she stops by AOL Build to talk fitness
text:
She was in search of a trainer to help her 'get in shape.'

And on Wednesday, Jana Kramer stepped out at AOL Build in New York, alongside celebrity trainer Erin Oprea.

The duo were there to discuss fitness, and Jana revealed that it was Carrie Underwood that introduced them.

Looking great! On Wednesday, Jana Kramer, 35, stepped out at AOL Build in New York

Jana, 35, wore a sleeveless, gray tank with the phrase, 'train to the beat,' written across it.

The mother-of-two paired her workout top with a set of black leggings and white sneakers.

The blonde beauty wore natural make-up, and accessorized with rings, a bracelet and her Apple watch.

Fitness gear: The country star wore a sleeveless, gray tank with the phrase, 'train to the beat,' written across it

Better together: She was joined by celebrity trainer Erin Oprea

From one country star to the next: Jana revealed that it was Carrie Underwood who introduced the two

Trainer Erin was previously in the Navy, and began taking celebrity clients 12 years ago. Her first client was Lee Ann Womack, followed by Carrie Underwood.

It was through Carrie that Jana and Erin met.

'So I obviously knew Carrie [Underwood] and we lived in the same neighborhood at the time,' Jana began, in an interview with AOL.

'And I was pregnant our [with husband Mike Caussin] daughter and I was like "Man, I really need to get in shape and I need someone to help me. And I was like, "Who looks amazing in country music?" Carrie,' she concluded.

The country star then DMed her on social media, and the rest was history.

Jana found her trainer while pregnant with daughter Jolie, which was the same time husband Mike was cheating on her.

'We had just celebrated a year and had a daughter who was 5 months old,' she told Tamron Hall.

'That was tough. And it's still real hard to look back on those memories because to me, they were real, but how were they real when you were doing this?'

Last year, Mike reportedly suffered a 'sex addiction relapse,' but the duo stuck through it.

The couple share daughter Jolie, three, and son Jace, 10 months.
